notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: This study #A04-E32-16B obtained expedited ethics approval from the McGill University Institutional Review Board. Participants indicated their consent by clicking “next” on an informational landing page prior to completing each survey round. The landing page described the aims of the study, the scope of their participation, benefits and risks of the study as well as confirmation of how their data would be kept confidential.

notes.title: Competing interests
notes.p: Authors VR and BMK are members of the Regulatory and Ethics Work Stream of the Global Alliance for Genomics and Health.
